subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brooks Conrad hit a pinch-hit grand slam to finish off a seven-run ninth inning that gave the host Atlanta Braves a 10-9 victory on Thursday over the Cincinnati Reds, who fell out of first in the National League Central.
snippet: Brooks Conrad hit a pinch-hit grand slam to finish off a seven-run ninth inning that gave the host Atlanta Braves a 10-9 victory on Thursday over the Cincinnati Reds, who fell out of first in the National League Central.
